title: Prodigy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Choose someone to get inspiration from every night.
-Choose to mature.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Getting inspiration means you will copy one of your targets ability.
-Maturing transforms you into a copy of a role randomly chosen of players that you got inspiration from.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Succesfully mature and complete your new goal

desc:
Post 18
*I'm talented in almost everything! I just don't know what's my purpose yet...*
